ARABIC: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except a Messenger with whom He is well pleased, and then He posts sentinels before him and behind him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Other than an apostle He has chosen, when He makes a sentinel walk in front of him and a sentinel behind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: other than to a Messenger whom He chooses (for the bestowal of any part of the knowledge of the Unseen), whereafter He appoints guards who go before him and behind him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He causes angelic guards to march before and after him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except to His chosen Noble Messengers – so He appoints guards in front and behind him. (Allah gave the knowledge of the hidden to the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except to a Messenger whom He has chosen, and then He makes a band of watching guards to march before him and behind him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except to him whom He chooses as an apostle; for surely He makes a guard to march before him and after him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: save only to such a Messenger as He is well-pleased with; then He despatches before him and behind him watchers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save unto every messenger whom He hath chosen, and then He maketh a guard to go before him and a guard behind him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except the messenger whom He has chosen. He sends down guardians who walk before them and behind them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save Unto an apostle chosen. And then He causeth to go before him and behind him a guard.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except to an apostle He approves of. Then He dispatches a sentinel before and behind him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except a messenger whom He has chosen: and then He makes a band of watchers march before him and behind him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except to a Messenger (from mankind) whom He has chosen (He informs him of unseen as much as He likes), and then He makes a band of watching guards (angels) to march before him and behind him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except only to a Messenger that He has chosen, and He sends guardians before him and behind him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except to a Messenger of His choosing. He then dispatches guards before him and behind him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:27] except to a messenger of whom He approves. Then, in addition to disclosing to him what He will [to disclose] of it, by way of [making it] a miracle for him, He despatches, He appoints and sends forth, before him, namely, the Messenger, and behind him watchers, angels to preserve him until He has conveyed [it] to him as part of the [entire] revelation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Save unto every messenger whom he hath chosen) He reveals to them some instances of the Unseen, (and then He maketh a guard) angels (to go before him) before the messenger (and a guard behind him) to protect him from the jinn, devils and human beings so that they do not hear Gabriel reciting the revelations.
